Ok, I just realized I forgot about like half my Maximals at the 
battle.


::Prowl/Lavacons/Perndabot/Repressor/FZ/Kluster/Firearm/Grimmler::

Prowl rolls in the air, avoiding several shots fired down at him. He 
turns and heads once again toward FZ, his guns firing. Prowl's wing 
orbs gave him an exact idea of what was going on around him, so he 
could 'see' shots fired at him even from behind.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ's scanners report a bot flying up behind him. By the time Shocker 
fires, FZ flies to the side, avoiding the shot. He growls as several 
shots from Prowl hit him. That bot was getting annoying.

FZ flies back a bit and fires one of his glowing missiles at Prowl. 
The Maximal spins to avoid it, but FZ presses a button on the missile 
launcher and the missile explodes in midair, right next to Prowl. A 
blue energy wave flows from the missile, enveloping about 6 feet in 
every direction and draining energy from everything it touches. 
Prowl's eyes widen as he feels his boosters shut off and his energy 
levels drop almost to the point of rendering him unconscious. He free-
falls toward the ground, feeling energy rush through him when he 
leaves the blue energy field and his energy levels slowly start to 
climb back toward normal.

Prowl looks up as his boosters come back online, seeing FZ's foot 
flying down toward him. Before he can react, FZ kicks him in the 
head, both bots falling toward the ground.

The blue energy field remains where it is, with the potential to 
drain bots that touch it of energy.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Eight nails dig into Astral's leg, sticking themselves into the 
armor. The Alliance bot growls and fires several plasma shots at 
Torca.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fenox ducks under the explosive tusk and several other shots, firing 
back with three shots from her rifle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Starlight flies backwards as optic blasts hit her, denting her armor. 
She fires back with several darts, reaching for her charge launcher. 
Several autogun shots hit her, making her aim a bit off.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing Klant taken care of, Recklessa turns to fire at Torca, a large 
energy blast sending her flying several dozen feet. Firearm drives 
into the battle, opening fire with his turret on Recklessa and his 
missile launcher on Bumblebee.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Griplash fires two missiles at Shocker. An EMP blast hits him in the 
leg, sending him down to the ground.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler runs out of the Cybertronian Fire, firing at Repressor and 
hitting the bot in the underside. Repressor shakes as he decends, 
mechfluid pouring from where Grimmler's shot hit him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot frowns, watching several Maximals arrive at battle. He 
makes his way toward the Cybertornian Fire, firing two missiles at 
Ratchet. He jumps into the air as the grassland catches on fire, 
accidently hitting FZ's energy field. Gasping, Perndabot falls back 
to the ground, trying to regain energy that was lost due to the field.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster jumps to the left, dodging several shots fired at him but 
nearly getting hit by a stray tranquilizer dart from Starlight. He 
looks up at Manterror, returning fire.
